Hello\n\nMy name is Brownie. I am a goblin. Let me tell you a story of Jupiter Artland.
A long time ago many magical creatures lived here. They were helping and protecting people.
They came from a magical dimention called Minecraft, where everything is almost the same but square.
One day, a terrible flood destroyed Jupiter Artland. Everyone was blamed creatures. Only Brian, one of humans keeped peace. Ever since then everyone trusts only him..
I suspect Brian is hidding something. Help me to find out the truth. Find me next to the Suck to start our adventure. Use the map if you don\'t know the way.\nSee you soon!

This is the map of invisible dimention of Jupiter Artland. Find the way to the next location to find Brownie\'s friends, find out what happened and find the treasure! There is a reward waiting for you.. Good luck !

You have found me!

The magic gold is missing.
It allows us to travel between dimentions. We need to find my friends and find out what happened to the gold.

First, let's go to the stone house.
I think someone lives there..

That\'s Glaistig! She is suprised to see humans. Also, She is upset becasue she stuck in Minecraft dimention like others.\n\nGlaistig is saying that has seen Brian and Blue Witch looking for something. We need to find his friend Cu Sith at the Temple of Apollo to find out more..

Cu Sith is a bit angry, he doesn\'t like children anymore, becasue they were mean to him. Cu Sith remembers that Brain was asking about the gold but he still trust him.. Well, let\'s walk to In Memory, there must be someone there..

Be careful, she is dangerous! You are safe, I will talk to her.. What\'s that, Witch? She said that it is not our buisness.. Oh no, She feels quilty becasue she helped Brain to find the gold! She doesn\'t know where is it now though.. It will be ok Witch, we will try to fix it. Let\'s walk to Life Mounds.
